wordageddon.dao.implementation

Class UserDAOSQLite

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.dao.implementation.UserDAOSQLite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDAO

    public class UserDAOSQLite
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserDAO
    SQLite implementation of the UserDAO interface for user data persistence. This class provides concrete implementation of all user-related database operations using SQLite as the underlying database. It handles: - User registration and authentication - User information retrieval and validation - Administrative user management - Database connection management and error handling All methods use prepared statements to prevent SQL injection attacks and proper resource management with try-with-resources blocks.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca
